alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:56AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Todd and eastern Bennett Counties through 145 AM MDT/245 AM CDT/... At 1256 AM MDT/156 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Vetal to 7 miles south of Harrington to 6 miles south of Lacreek Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Francis, Parmelee, Spring Creek, Tuthill, Upper Cut Meat, He Dog, Harrington, Vetal, Grass Mountain, Two Strike, Lacreek Wildlife Refuge and western Rosebud Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
